title: Five-Star Gold Coast Escape for Families and Couples
description: Beautiful beaches, endless entertainment and family-friendly fun await in the Gold Coast, where you'll enjoy a stay at RACV Royal Pines Resort - a five-star retreat perfectly located between the sun-soaked sand and lush hinterland. Located only 15 minutesâ€™ drive from Broadbeach and near popular attractions such as Surfers Paradise, Currumbin Sanctuary, Robina Town Centre, an abundance of theme parks and Metricon Stadium, the best of the Gold Coast is at your doorstep. Includes daily buffet breakfast, welcome bottle of wine on arrival, AU$50 food and beverage credit, guaranteed late 12pm checkout and more. Plus, children (16 years and under) stay free!
